ygData.subject: Re: BBC at level 1.
ygData.msgSnippet: It is very unproductive to use higher levels weapons as a low level character.  You will never be able to effectively (meaning use it at your level of
ygData.messageBody:
It is very unproductive to use higher levels weapons as a low level
character. You will never be able to effectively (meaning use it at your
level of experience) use it until you attain the level at which you could
have possibly acquired the item. This is some newer code implemented to
help reduce twinking. You are just not skilled enough in the art to use
this powerful a weapon. Do not get me wrong, you will be able to use it,
just not as well as you should be able to.

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Swift [mailto:tswift@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 9:42 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] BBC at level 1.
>
>
> From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>
> Same here....2 handed would not go up at all at low level. I
> finally dumped
> 10 points into it and it made a world of difference.
>
> I have heard that it is counter productive to be using high level magic
> weapons at lower levels though. Something about not being able to max
> weapon skills at each level. Of course I haven't confirmed this.....but I
> have read it at least twice on 2 mail lists.
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 10:52 AM
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] BBC at level 1.
>
>
> >From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
> >
> >Nope, the same thing happened to me on a rusty 2-H I had when I was low
> level. I
> >had to jump start the skill with about 6 or 8 points before it
> even started
> >advancing. Not sure why though.
> >
> >
> >"Mifsud, Michael" wrote:
> >
> >> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >>
> >> I noticed something curious yesterday. My level 23rd character has a
> bbc, I
> >> never use it, but I dont want to give it away either. I
> started another
> >> warrior and gave her the BBC. I wanted to keep both my 1hslash and
> 2hslash
> >> nice and high with this character.
> >>
> >> After 2 levels my 2hand slash NEVER went up. I did put a
> practice point
> in
> >> it as well, seems odd. New programming for powerful items?
> >
> >
